title: Pokémon Legends: Arceus Isn’t Great. It Doesn’t Matter
content: Game Freak once again gets away with not nailing an open-world Pokémon game. And we are powerless to stop it happening again and again.
description: Game Freak once again gets away with not nailing an open-world Pokémon game. And we are powerless to stop it happening again and again.
